content: अप्रतिहत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not obstructed or impeded, irresistible; °हतान् पुत्रान् <ls>K. 62</ls>; अस्मदगृहे °गतिः <ls>Pt. 1</ls> free to move; <ls>U. 3. 36</ls>; जृंभतामप्रतिहतप्रसरमार्यस्य क्रोधज्योतिः <ls>Ve. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Unimpaired, unmarred, unrepulsed, unaffected, at home in every respect; सा बुद्धिरप्रतिहता <ls>Bh. 2. 40</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 26</ls>; so °चित्त, °मनस्. {@--3@} Not disappointed.
